::Battera::

She wasn't going to give up that easily.  She flew up into the rafters of 
the lab and crawled into an air vent.  She hoped no one saw her.  She 
crawled until she reached an outside grid.  All she had to do was get past 
the grid.  The grid was electified and could shock a bot to death.  But she 
didn't care, if she went back, she would be killed.  Her choices were slim. 
But she had to try.  Shebraced herself and rammed it as hard as she could.

>From: JP3884@...

>Subject: Re: The Neo Beast Wars


>::: Hell Beast growled ::: Transanulas, Gremlin, Jackle, Black Aracnia, and
>Transanulas, return to the ship with me. Inferno, Marine, and rampage, stay
>here. Your under Shukos command for now.
>
>::: Hell Beast and his troops returned home. They entered the base and
>recived Scourges message about Vuloris. Hell Beast decided enough was 
>enough.
>He entered there lab, followed by Transanulas, Gremlin, Jackle, Pheniox, 
>and
>Black Aracnia. :::
>
>::: Hell Beast, with the TM3 driver in his hands ::: I know about your sick
>little scheme. You missed a bug, his name was Scourge.
>
>::: With that, he threw the TM3 drive to the floor and stamped it to 
>peices.
>The Predacons drew there wepons :::
>
>::: Hell Beast ::: Now surrender your wepons, and go peacefully to the Brig
>until we have a trial. Or, you could get shot right now, and scince were
>blocking the only exit in the room, I suggest you take the first option.
